name: ONLY ONE BULLET SPACEHIPSHOOTER
description:
Made For GMTK GameJam 2019 with the Theme Only One Shot.
  •  I went with the Idea of Asteroids, but with One Bullet and Trippy. The Bullet itself acts as the ball from breakout, but can be pulled back to you by holding SPACE
  •  A one man team effort, was great fun doing the Gamejam, now I am off to sleep
  • Control with WASD or ARROW KEYS
  • SHOOT with SPACEBAR
